net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Library Version Control
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Usage: Select the library tokens to version and execute this macro. You will be shown the current version of each token and an input for the new version. You will also be prompted to input changes (ala, release notes) associated to the new version. Release notes will be displayed in an html format, so newline separators should be
. There are two relevant propertyes: libversion & lib.releaseNotesObj. lib.releaseNotesObj is a JSON object that maps the version to release notes so we can differentiate what's changed from version to version. Currently there's no management of the size of that object, but as this gains traction and versions are incremented, at some point we'll want to begin pruning old version release notes from this object. But that's not in this macro just yet.
